Messages.Author: Stefan Häselbarth
Messages.Content: Dear students,  the REI lecture will not take place tomorrow due to the oral exams. Tomorrow and on Friday we will conduct the oral exams. Next week, on the 11.07.2024, the REI-exam will take place from 8 – 10 a.m. in EMH 225. Please prepare for the exam by revieweing the lectures and assignments. The REI exam willl be 60 minutes. Only a non-programmable calculator is allowed for the exam.  Best regards, Stefan Häselbarth

Messages.Author: Stefan Häselbarth
Messages.Content: Oral Exams Announcement Procedure Overview: Room: EMH-228, SENSE Department, highest floor Dates: 04 and 05 July (according to your chosen time and date in ISIS) Times: Stick to your assigned appointment time to avoid a grade of 0 points. Duration: Each exam lasts 5 minutes. Documentation: Have your Student ID card ready for identification. Best regards, Stefan Häselbarth

Messages.Author: Stefan Häselbarth
Messages.Content: The Oral Exam will take place on the 04. and 05. July. Please sign up for a spot. Questions can be about any topic from the course.  Best regards, Stefan Häselbarth

Messages.Author: Stefan Häselbarth
Messages.Content: Due to an urgent time conflict, we need to start today already at 13:45. Sorry for that. See you later. Stefan

Messages.Author: Nicolas Francisco Mira Gebauer
Messages.Content: Hi all, Please remember that if you have any question or problem regarding the homeworks, you should address it directly with me, and not with Stefan Häselbarth.  Moreover, remember that every thursday at 13:00 you can come to my office (Room EMH 202). Best regards, Nicolas

Messages.Author: Stefan Häselbarth
Messages.Content: The exam registration will close on the 03.05.2024. If you are not registered, a course participation will not be possible. Best regards, Stefan Häselbarth

Messages.Author: Nicolas Francisco Mira Gebauer
Messages.Content: Dear students, Remember that every Thursday at 13:00 am you can come to my office (EMH 202) to ask questions about the homeworks. However, tomorrow in particular the consultation hours will be moved to 14:30 hrs. Best regards, Nicolas Mira-Gebauer

Messages.Author: Alexander Sylwester Czerniak
Messages.Content: Hello,  the written test is to be expected on 11.07.2024 8-10 a. m.? I am asking because in the Organisational Matters Slides and in Exercise 5 there are different dates noted. Is next thursday 8-10 a. m. correct? Kind Regards Alexander

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Derivation voltage transfer ratio boost converter DCM

Messages.Author: Moritz Tim Wegner
Messages.Content: Hello,  I have a question regarding the derivation of the voltage transfer ratio of the boost converter.  On slide 26 of the lecture on DCDC converter in open loop operation there are two equations I find very confusing and kind of contradicting. In equation 6 the average voltage across the controllable switch is calculated. This equation is clear. But in equation 7 it says that V_DS is equal to V_in which is only the case for the time when the current is zero. Then equation 7 and 8 are plugged into equation 6.  How do we get equation 7? I cant imagine why the average value of V_DS should be V_in, this is only the case during the time of zero current. In my understanding equation 6 and 7 contradict each other.  Could you help me to understand the derivation.  Greeting,  Moritz

Messages.Content: where will the oral exam and written exam take place? EMH 228 and EMH 225? the slides are from the last year and the Dates are also wrong.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Looking for a partner for lab assisgnments

Messages.Author: Yifei Ma
Messages.Content: Hey there, I'm looking for a a partner for lab assisgnments. What I can: Matlab/Simulink. In my Bachelorarbeit I used Simulink to create a Photovoltage control system. I hope you: be good at doing calculation and using formula editor (Latex, Mathtype or Word). Wish to see your comments! With best regards
